name: BiTCRUSH (Oliver Morrish)
description:
BiTCRUSH is a classic arcade-style platformer where the level builds itself dynamically as you play. Using your jump, boost, and fast-fall mechanics, try to climb as high as you can.

The game features 12 unique unlockable game modes, each providing their own experience. These include:

  • Tromino, Tetromino, and Pentomino Modes
  • Upside-Down Mode, which inverts the screen
  • BiTCRUSHER Mode, for the best players
  • BiTWARPED Mode, which features strange and massive block configurations
  • ...and more!

Don't like strong primary and secondary colours? Well there are also 12 unlockable colour palettes to choose from, including a "random" one that changes the palette each time you play.

CONTROLS

CREDITS

Music used is: "8Bit Onward!" & "8 Bit Scrap!" by @HeatleyBros. Check out their YouTube channel here.

OTHER STUFF ABOUT BiTCRUSH

BiTCRUSH may receive the odd update for bug-fixes. It's a project I've had sitting around for a while (most of it was written in early 2020!) and the design is pretty clunky since it was my first "big-ish" project. I figured I'd put it up for some people to enjoy. Thanks for giving it a shot!
